contest-event.event-date:
June 4, 1906 D West Stanley Contest (Amateur Contest)
West Stanley Contest (Amateur Contest) 20 Test Piece Contest West Stanley Contest west-stanley-contest-amateur-contest-1
L'Etoile du Nord [arr. Godfrey]
West Stanley, County Durham
1st prize £15. 2nd prize £7.10s. 3rd prize £4. 4th prize £2. 5th prize £1.
March contest 1st (£1.10s.) Heworth, 2nd (10s.) Hetton.
7 bands competed.
March 2, 2012, 2:26 p.m. July 22, 2013, 12:33 p.m.
1 Palmer's Works J. A. Greenwood
2 Hetton Silver Band William Straughan
3 Hebburn Town William Heap

5 Pelton Fell Workmen's J. Wishart
Unknown Result South Moor Colliery Silver Prize Band Unknown
